subject: Re: desktop-base and KDE
body:
Gustavo Franco wrote:
> Could you just confirm
> that the desktop-base version is 4.0.1?

yes, it[0] is 4.0.1.

> What about `ls -al
> /etc/alternatives/desktop*' command output ?

user@debian:~$ ls -al /etc/alternatives/desktop-*
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 59 2007-04-23 16:20
/etc/alternatives/desktop-background ->
/usr/share/images/desktop-base/debian-blueish-wallpaper.svg
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 54 2007-04-23 16:20
/etc/alternatives/desktop-splash ->
/usr/share/images/desktop-base/gnome-splash-curves.png
user@debian:~$

these two must be manually adjusted then, because the desktop task pulls
gnome session in, and desktop-base likes gnome more than kde, right?

--
